channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NY

item.title: Report E-2023090006
item.description:
Report E-2023090006

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-04
  • City: TONAWANDA
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit due to improper blocking and bracing and that one of the large 2000 pound forklift battery(2794) had fallen over and released 1 gallon of acid. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report X-2023081926
item.description:
Report X-2023081926

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-25
  • City: BRONX
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was carried onto van line 100 and a leakage was noticed by a manager and immediately was placed in a hazmat bin by a manager and away from work area. DescribePack: There was a small puncture in the blue cap bottle of rapicide a as well as a loose cap on the second container of rapicide a. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately was placed in a hazmat bin by a manager and away from work area.

item.title: Report X-2023080800
item.description:
Report X-2023080800

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-07T15:11:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-05
  • City: LONG ISLAND CITY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: SEQUENCE OF EVENTS IS UNKNOWN. DescribePack: THIS PACKAGE CONTAINED 4 GLASS CONTAINERS OF ACETONE. UNFORTUNATELY, THIS PACKAGE BECAME DAMAGED AT SOME POINT. ONE OF THE CONTAINERS HAS SHATTERED. AS A RESULT, THE CONTENTS HAVE COMPLETELY LEAKED OUT. THE PACKAGE MAY HAVE BEEN DROPPED. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PKG WAS PLACED IN OUR DAMAGED HAZMAT CAGE.

item.title: Report X-2023080994
item.description:

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS RESPONDER DISCOVERED (12) 10.14 FLUID OUNCE CANS OF FLAMMABLE GAS LIGHTER REFILLS AEROSOLS. NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.
